name: Category Expander
author: Joseph Hinson and Tim Grahl

sections.description:
Do you have a lot of categories and are sick of having a huge list in your sidebar? Want to highlight only a few of them to make your site easier to navigate?

While redesigning WordPress sites for our clients we kept running into this problem over and over. They had a huge list of legacy categories but only wanted to highlight a few of them. We wrote this plugin to allow them to select which categories to show and which categories to initially hide.

All categories are still accessible by a “see all” link at the bottom of the list.

Add the widget to your sidebar to make it live.
sections.installation: Upload the Category Expander plugin to your blog, Activate it, update your settings and add the widget to your sidebar.

short_description: Allows WordPress Admins to show only a selected few categories on the sidebar and hide the rest from view until visitor clicks "See All".
